title: Why are Juice WRLD and XXXTentacion dead? - Quora

response.answer_text: Juice WRLD- Jared Anthony Higgins fatally overdosed on oxycodone and codeine after federal agents seized his private plane in an attempt to find guns and drugs on December 9, 2019. XXXTentacion - Jahseh Dwayne Ricardo Onfroy was shopping for a motorcycle in Deerfield Beach, Florida when he was blocked from exiting the store’s car park and two men fatally shot Jahseh after stealing a Louis Vuitton bag containing $50,000.
